title: 'He was just a child': dead of Indigenous residential schools haunt Canada
content:
1. 'He was just a child': dead of Indigenous residential schools haunt Canada  The Guardian
  2. Canada's Trudeau blasts Catholic Church for ignoring role in indigenous schools  Reuters
  3. Remains of 215 Indigenous Canadian children found on site of school they were forced to attend  CBS This Morning
  4. Hundreds turn out in Surrey in honour of 215 Indigenous children – Surrey Now-Leader  Surrey Now Leader
  5. Today's letters: It is time to confront the terrible legacy of Canada's residential schools  Ottawa Citizen
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
